full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BYUNG RGYAL DU BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSGOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BA'I, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, ,DE LAS RGYAS PA ZHIG BGYI ZHES BSKUL BA LA DOM LDOG PAR, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL DU BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN BGYIS BGYIS PA'I NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BYAMS SHING BZOD PA GSOL, ,'ON KYANG GANG GYIS PA KUN LA PHAN PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
